title: VR Quote of the Day
content:
While it is still fairly early in the day, I feel confident in saying that this is quote of the day . 

Chet Faliszek told the EGX crowd that the developer, not the hardware, is responsible for creating feelings of nausea. "The idea that VR must get you sick is [bullsh*t]." 

 Comments 
 Posted by Steve 7:50 AM (CST)
